author: Erin Durkin
title: NYC could ease coronavirus restrictions in late May, but hampered by lack of testing
description: The city is far short of the test capacity it will need and has no concrete plan for a large-scale expansion.
content:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio. | AP Photo
New York City could begin to ease some coronavirus restrictions in late May or June but it will require widespread testing of residents for the virus, which the city does not yet have the ability to do.
Even as… [+3278 chars]
